A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi not only falls short of the massive hype built up in fandom\, but also falters from major plot deficiencies\, disorienting moments that break the suspension of disbelief\, a near-total disregard for the questions and expectations raised by The Force Awakens\, and the importing of a foreign visual style into the Star Wars franchise. Cool action sequences\, emotional reunions\, and a powerful 3rd (4th?) Act cannot make up for these glaring missteps.
